title: Leading mobile messengers in the U.S. 2019 , by users
yAxis: Number of monthly unique users in millions
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Number of monthly unique users in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
Platform Facebook Messenger has the highest Number of monthly unique users in millions and WeChat has the lowest Number of monthly unique users in millions.
The difference of Number of monthly unique users in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 104.92.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Number of monthly unique users in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Number of monthly unique users in millions 106.4 is found at Platform Facebook Messenger and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Number of monthly unique users in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
Platform Facebook Messenger has the highest Number of monthly unique users in millions and WeChat has the lowest Number of monthly unique users in millions.
The difference of Number of monthly unique users in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 104.92.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Number of monthly unique users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monthly unique users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook Messenger and lowest at Platform WeChat.
The highest Platform Facebook Messenger has 104.92 more Number of monthly unique users in millions than the lowest Platform WeChat.
Platform Facebook Messenger is higher than any other Platforms with value 106.4, followed by Snapchat, and WhatsApp. Down to Platform WeChat with the lowest value 1.48.
The Platform WeChat has 4.97 times less Number of monthly unique users in millions than average.
The Number of monthly unique users in millions is 256.72 if we add up values of all Platforms.
